data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: You are scrolled to the top
data.expected_result: You aren't scrolled to the top as you cannot interact with the UI while the new create/join server menu is open
data.short_description: When the new join/create server options are open, you can tap the top of the screen to scroll to the top of the channel or server lists
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the new create/join server menu - Tap the very top of the screen, where the time is, above either the server or channel list
